name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.max-lock-hold-to-release-lease-ms
description:
During the release of lease a lock is hold that make any
    operations on the namenode stuck. In order to not block them during
    a too long duration we stop releasing lease after this max lock limit.

name: dfs.blocksize
description:
The default block size for new files, in bytes.
      You can use the following suffix (case insensitive):
      k(kilo), m(mega), g(giga), t(tera), p(peta), e(exa) to specify the size (such as 128k, 512m, 1g, etc.),
      Or provide complete size in bytes (such as 134217728 for 128 MB).

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
description:
The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting
  files, in megabytes.  By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which
  should minimize seeks.

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: dfs.client.refresh.read-block-locations.ms
description: Refreshing LocatedBlocks period. A value of 0 disables the feature.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.load.retries
description:
The number of retries on the Datanode to load the provided aliasmap;
      defaults to 0.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.period-ms
description:
How frequently the decay factor should be applied to the
    operation counts of users. Higher values have less overhead, but respond
    less quickly to changes in client behavior.
    This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.
